Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: commanding entrance hall

With light peach walls kissed by a hint of blush rising the full two stories of the estate, this commanding entrance hall is flooded with light that reflects off the highly polished sheen of the basalt tile floor. The ceiling overhead is punctuated by skylights, beneath which hang small gilt chandeliers laden with glass crystals. A circular royal blue rug fills the center of the room, a matching carpet climbing the dark mahogany treads of the grand staircase that leads to hallway overlooking the space from above. Tall doors reaching nearly to the ceiling are set into the northern, eastern, and southern walls, while a smaller pair of double doors of the same dark mahogany is nestled at the crook of the staircase.

With light peach walls kissed by a hint of blush rising the full two stories of the estate, this commanding entrance hall is flooded with light that reflects off the highly polished sheen of the basalt tile floor. The ceiling overhead is punctuated by skylights, beneath which hang small gilt chandeliers laden with glass crystals. A circular royal blue rug fills the center of the room, a matching carpet climbing the dark mahogany treads of the grand staircase that leads to hallway overlooking the space from above. Tall doors reaching nearly to the ceiling are set into the northern, eastern, and southern walls, while a smaller pair of double doors of the same dark mahogany is nestled at the crook of the staircase.

With light peach walls kissed by a hint of blush rising the full two stories of the estate, this commanding entrance hall is flooded with light that reflects off the highly polished sheen of the basalt tile floor. The ceiling overhead is punctuated by skylights, beneath which hang small gilt chandeliers laden with glass crystals. A circular royal blue rug fills the center of the room, a matching carpet climbing the dark mahogany treads of the grand staircase that leads to hallway overlooking the space from above. Tall doors reaching nearly to the ceiling are set into the northern, eastern, and southern walls, while a smaller pair of double doors of the same dark mahogany is nestled at the crook of the staircase.
a pair of tall mahogany double doors leading east

Reaching nearly to the ceiling and fashioned from dark mahogany, the double doors leading to the east are each divided into four panels of equal height by thin strips of decorative moulding. The uppermost panel in either column features an arch-top design that tapers to a point in the center. $(parent-desc)
a tall mahogany door leading north

Reaching nearly to the ceiling and fashioned from dark mahogany, the door leading to the north is divided into four panels of equal height by thin strips of decorative moulding. The uppermost panel in either column features an arch-top design that tapers to a point in the center. $(parent-desc)
a tall mahogany door leading south

Reaching nearly to the ceiling and fashioned from dark mahogany, the door leading to the south is divided into four panels of equal height by thin strips of decorative moulding. The uppermost panel in either column features an arch-top design that tapers to a point in the center. $(parent-desc)
the grand staircase leading up

The grand staircase leading up spans the full length of the western wall and splits into a fork as it descends along the northern and southern walls. It is decorated with a thick royal blue rug to match the larger, circular counterpart at the foot of the stairs. A row of three arches opens to the hallway on the second floor. $(parent-desc)
You pass through one of the arches at the top of the grand staircase and descend to the ground floor.
You ascend the grand staircase and pass through one of the arches leading into the hallway on the second floor.
emerges through one of the arches at the top of the grand staircase and descends to the ground floor.
ascends the grand staircase and disappears through one of the arches leading into the hallway on the second floor.
a pair of mahogany double doors leading west

Tucked into the wall at the center of the split staircase and fashioned from dark mahogany, the double doors leading to the west are each divided into four panels of equal height by thin strips of decorative moulding. The uppermost panel in either column features an arch-top design that tapers to a point in the center. $(parent-desc)
the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling

Rising approximately twenty-four feet overhead, the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling is eggshell in color with generic medallions bordering the recessed center. A number of skylights are spaced at even intervals across the ceiling.

Rising approximately twenty-four feet overhead, the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling is eggshell in color with generic medallions bordering the recessed center. A number of skylights are spaced at even intervals across the ceiling.
one of the small gilt chandeliers
Arranged between the skylights, numerous small gilt chandeliers laden with glass crystals hang from the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling.
the small gilt chandeliers
Arranged between the skylights, numerous small gilt chandeliers laden with glass crystals hang from the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling.
one of the brightdim, snow-covered skylights overhead
BrightlyDimly lit by above and covered in a fine blanket of snow, this is one of several skylights fitted at even intervals into the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling.
the brightdim, snow-covered skylights overhead
BrightlyDimly lit by above and covered in a fine blanket of snow, a number of skylights are fitted at even intervals into the vaulted ornamental plaster ceiling.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the eastern wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). A pair of tall mahogany double doors is set into the center of this wall.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the eastern wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). A pair of tall mahogany double doors is set into the center of this wall.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the northern wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). A tall mahogany door is set into the eastern side of this wall.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the northern wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). A tall mahogany door is set into the eastern side of this wall.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the southern wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). A tall mahogany door is set into the eastern side of this wall.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the southern wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). A tall mahogany door is set into the eastern side of this wall.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the western wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). The grand staircase occupies much of this wall, with a shorter pair of mahogany double doors set into its center on the ground floor. The wall at the top of the staircase features a row of three arches through which one can access the second floor.

Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the western wall has been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color). The grand staircase occupies much of this wall, with a shorter pair of mahogany double doors set into its center on the ground floor. The wall at the top of the staircase features a row of three arches through which one can access the second floor.
Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the walls have been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color).
Approximately twenty-four feet in height, the walls have been covered over with textured plaster and painted $(this.trait:wall:color).

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ Footsteps can be heard overhead, pacing back and forth somewhere on the second floor. \| A dull clatter can be heard from somewhere in the distance as a \{ pot \| pan \| plate \} is dropped on the floor. \| Soft, muted \{ laughter \| talking \| arguing \| singing \} can be heard from somewhere deeper in the estate. \| The dull sound of \{ raised voices \| laughter \| crying \| arguing \} behind closed doors can be heard somewhere deeper in the manor. \| A \{ young servant girl \| young woman \| woman \| maid \} slips into the room, silently curtsying before continuing up the stairs. \| A very faint \{ child's cry \| song \| giggle \} can be heard from somewhere on the second floor. \| A \{ guardsman \| soldier \| guard \} pauses to bow subtly before he continues on his rounds of the estate. \} \ \ \{ A hush falls over the estate as the candles overhead flicker in the dim light of the evening. \| A soft hush of murmuring voices can be head passing through the hallway upstairs. \| A young \{ guard \| soldier \| guardsman \} in formal dress nods somberly as he passes, continuing on his evening rounds. \| The estate is quiet for a moment, the silence nearly deafening. \| A soft \{ laugh \| giggle \| song \} can be heard somewhere up on the second story. \| A \{ servant girl \| maid \| servant \} pauses to curtsy before hefting a large armload of \{ laundry \| dishes \| empty glasses \| large packages \} through a nearby door. \| The candles overhead flicker and flash, casting long dark shadows around the recesses of the room. \| A very faint child's cry can be heard from somewhere on the second floor. \} \ \}
